Set Ability 1: Once per combat you may prevent an overstep attack against you
Once per combat you may reroll a defense value
For one combat per day, you may increase your hand size by 1
Once per day, if you take damage, you may play an additional action on your next turn
Once per combat you may heal up to an amount equal to your level after taking damage
Once per day, if an attack would Down you, set health to 1 instead
